N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 178.7 - Conditions of participation

State Regulations
(a) All
conditions of participation shall include: (1)
a daily schedule which will be developed
in conjunction with the youth and, to the extent feasible, the
parent; (2)
a list of the programs
and activities in which the youth must participate; (3)
a list of prohibited
activities; (4)
any other
requirements deemed appropriate by the director; and
(5)
the following statements: "I accept placement in this program. I understand that
participation in this program is a privilege rather than a right. I will obey
the terms and conditions of the program. I understand that: oDuring the program I will be in the custody of the New York

State DIVISION FOR YOUTH (DFY); oI will have regular contact with persons assigned by DFY to
supervise me; oThe Director of DFY may end my assignment to this day
placement program at any time; and o If my participation in this program ends, I may be transferred to a residential facility consistent with my Family Court

Placement Order."
(b) Prior to assignment to a day placement
program, the conditions of participation shall be signed and dated by the youth
and the staff person or persons who verbally explained the conditions to the
youth and the parent. (c) A copy of
the conditions of participation shall be provided to the youth and the
parent. (d) A youth who refuses to
consent to the conditions of participation shall not be admitted to a day
placement program. Notes
